successes.title: FrackNation
successes.description: FrackNation is a feature documentary that will tell the truth about fracking for natural gas in US and globally.

Pledges.description: You will become an Executive Producer of the film and will be listed in the credits (unless you don't want to).
The above, and a DVD of the film will be sent to you so you can play it as many times as you want at home.
All of the above, and you will receive a photograph of the making of the film signed by the Directors.
All of the above, and you will be listed under a “Special thank you” section on the film’s web site.
All of the above, and we will send you a poster of the film to help remind you of your generosity every time you look at it.
All of the above, and you will receive a poster signed by the Directors.
All of the above, and we will send you 1 DVD of each of the Directors' previous films: 1 copy of Not Evil Just Wrong and 1 copy of Mine Your Own Business.
All of the above, and you will receive an additional 3 DVDs of the film to give out as gifts to friends.

All of the above, and your 2012 Christmas shopping will be completed because you will be sent 10 DVDs (in addition to the other ones above). You will also have the satisfaction that you are a big supporter of our film.
All of the above, and a personalized thank you letter from the Directors.
All of the above, and a special thank you phone call from the Directors where you will be thanked for your generous support of our film and talk about whatever you want during the call.
